sourceOrganization.name: NIAID MIB Program
sourceOrganization.description: The NIAID Modeling Immunity for Biodefense (MIB) program brings together immunologists, microbiologists, bioinformaticians, and modelers to advance our understanding of the complex immune mechanisms triggered by infection and/or vaccination. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/modeling-immunity-biodefense
